projects.title: Pulse
projects.description: Real time crowd info for your next move

images.alt: Dinner table with glasses with Pulse logo overlayed
images.caption: Pulse is a real-time crowd and vibe checker to help beat decision paralysis and empower people to move through their city with confidence.

images.alt: Screen shot of interface displaying real-time crowd data
images.caption: Leverages real-time user data to provide information about crowd density and user sentiment for any location.

images.alt: Screen shot of interface displaying user feedback survey
images.caption: Users contribute to the data pool via short in-app feedback surveys.

images.alt: Screen shot of interface displaying personalized recommendations
images.caption: Data is used to provide machine backed recommendations for personalized points of interest for their next move.

images.alt: Screen shot of interface displaying map with vibe indicators
images.caption: Pulse uses geolocation and user-provided data to provide users with real-time information about their surroundings.

images.alt: Screen shot of interface displaying POI reviews
images.caption: Pulse is designed to mimic popular map interfaces while adding the recommendations users love from their favorite social platforms, making it easy for anyone to access without needing extensive training.

images.alt: Screen shot of interface displaying POI information
images.caption: Pulse is designed to mimic popular map interfaces while adding the recommendations users love from their favorite social platforms, making it easy for anyone to access without needing extensive training.

projects.title: Gilbert
projects.description: A collaborative platform AI assistant to help teams get to synergy sooner.

images.alt: Title screen for Gilbert
images.caption: Gilbert is a collaborative platform AI assistant designed to help teams achieve synergy more quickly.

images.alt: Screen shot of Gilbert providing in-meeting insights
images.caption: Intended for integration with existing team meeting and collaboration platforms, Gilbert utilizes AI algorithms to analyze team dynamics and provide actionable insights.

images.alt: Screen shot of Gilbert facilitating an icebreaker activity
images.caption: From breaking the ice to post-meeting reflections, Gilbert enhances every stage of collaboration.

images.alt: Screen shot of Gilbert providing post-meeting insights
images.caption: From breaking the ice to post-meeting reflections, Gilbert enhances every stage of collaboration.

images.alt: Screen shot of an imagined home page for GetUp!
images.caption: GetUp! helps users step away from their desks and take breaks by tapping into their sense of competition and social network.

images.alt: Screen shot of GetUp! showing the break reminder feature
images.caption: GetUp! reminds users to take breaks with wellness tips.

images.alt: Screen shot of GetUp! showing the leaderboard
images.caption: Users can build up a streak and climb the leaderboards by consistently taking breaks.

images.alt: Screen shot of GetUp! showing the customizable space
images.caption: Custom avatars allow users to connect with their teammates virtually.

projects.title: Mini Design System
projects.description: A mini design system for my portfolio website.

images.alt: Screen shot of the mini design system cover photo
images.caption: This design system inspired the overall design of my portfolio website and features components and their specifications.

images.alt: Screen shot of the portfolio v1
images.caption: See how this system was used to design V1 of this portfolio.

projects.title: Decolonizing HCI
projects.description: The dominance of western culture in Human Computer Interaction and methods to elevate non-western ideologies.

images.alt: Global HCI research study
images.caption: Essay that explores the negative effects of colonialism on research done in HCI by reviewing three popular research methods in the field.

projects.title: Rideshare for Low Vision Users
projects.description: Improving the Rideshare Experience of Users Who are Blind or Have Low Vision.

images.alt: Blind rideshare research study
images.caption: Research study that discusses the rideshare experiences of blind or low vision users and suggests improvements for the end-to-end experience.

projects.title: Turkish Airlines Redesign
projects.description: A redesign of the Turkish Airlines website

images.alt: Turkish Airlines redesign
images.caption: Study that investigates and summarizes the findings of an in depth evaluation of the useability of the TurkishAirlines websites. It includes summaries of evaluations done with real participants, notable findings and recommendations.

projects.title: NYT Cooking Evaluation
projects.description: A Heuristic Evaluation and Cognitive Walkthrough of the NYT Cooking website.

images.alt: NYT Cooking evaluation
images.caption: Analysis of the NYTCooking website based on the “10 Usability Heuristics for User Interface Design” determined by the Nielsen Norman Group and an assessment of the site’s learnability.
